**Building Permits are handled by The City of East Bernard at City Hall. Online permit applications: [click here](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__eastbernard2.portal.iworq.net_portalhome_eastbernard2&d=DwMFAw&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=WgdABkfIeDWvbPvCrQYW0oqzoUDcKM1dur56erMMyiY&m=fkTkLdwuwyRZviVJJGCqYqst2RLSHzEAfWf6EJbWJ9_Ju3Nwmr2pt551FIuV3pyZ&s=wk83KeOIhGL94pX92vZ72sEcYoj5dRX-LuRZRUQaVMY&e=)**

**Please email permit applications to: permits@eastbernardtx.com**  
**Please visit the [Wharton County Permits](http://co.wharton.tx.us/default.aspx?Wharton_County/PermitsInspections911Addressing) website for Flood Plain Permitting and 911 address information.**
